backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (Song, VoiceSample, VoicePersona, Cover, LyricsRequest) and public functions for uploading songs/voice samples, creating personas/covers, and managing lyrics-based generation requests with persistent Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting debugging tasks for library save mechanisms in cover and generation modes, including verification of backend calls, console logging additions, and automatic navigation after processing completion.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing summaries of all frontend source files, describing components, hooks, and configuration files with details about their functionality, state management, and recent debugging enhancements.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm orange-to-red gradient palette and design tokens for UI consistency.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, title 'AI Voice Cover App', and script tag loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing multi-view navigation (create/library/personas), workflow state for cover and generation modes, persona-first workflow support, and processing completion handlers with comprehensive console logging, query invalidation, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Audio player component with play/pause controls, seek slider, volume control, time display, and song metadata display, using custom useAudioPlayer hook to manage playback state.
frontend/src/components/DownloadButton.t: A React component that downloads audio files (MP3 or WAV) from an ExternalBlob, handling format conversion, filename normalization, and displaying loading states with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/FormatSelector.t: A radio group component for selecting audio download format (MP3 or WAV) with visual descriptions of each format's characteristics.
frontend/src/components/GenerationMode.t: Manages the lyrics-to-song generation workflow, accepting lyrics and style prompts, submitting them to the backend actor, and triggering the generation process with detailed console logging.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper providing header with branding, navigation tabs (Create/Library/Personas), background styling, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/components/Library.tsx: Displays user's song library with playback controls, download options (MP3/WAV), social sharing, and integrated audio player for previewing songs.
frontend/src/components/LyricsInput.tsx: A textarea component for entering song lyrics with character count validation (minimum 20 characters) and submit button for generating songs.
frontend/src/components/ModeSelector.tsx: Initial mode selection screen presenting two options: covering an existing song or generating a new song from lyrics, with feature descriptions for each.
frontend/src/components/Personas.tsx: Manages voice personas with create/delete/select functionality, allowing users to save named voice samples for quick reuse. Includes a dialog for creating new personas with voice recording/upload and displays existing personas in a card grid.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingStatus: Displays animated processing stages and progress for both cover and generation workflows, polling backend status and invoking completion callback when finished. Shows stage-by-stage progress with visual indicators for analyzing, separating/composing, synthesizing, mixing, and mastering.
frontend/src/components/SocialShare.tsx: Provides social sharing functionality with dropdown menu for Facebook and YouTube upload options. Includes Web Share API fallback and opens dedicated YouTube upload dialog.
frontend/src/components/SongUpload.tsx: Handles song file upload (MP3/WAV/M4A) with title/artist metadata input and progress tracking. Uploads audio to backend actor and triggers completion callback with song details.
frontend/src/components/StyleKeywords.ts: Displays clickable badge keywords for music style suggestions (808, Auto-Tune, genres, tempos, etc.). Allows users to quickly add common style descriptors to their input.
frontend/src/components/VoiceInput.tsx: Provides toggle between record and upload modes for voice sample input. Wraps VoiceRecorder and VoiceUpload components with unified interface.
frontend/src/components/VoiceRecorder.ts: Records audio from microphone with real-time duration display and audio level visualization, then uploads to backend as voice sample. Shows animated microphone icon and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/VoiceUpload.tsx: React component for uploading voice samples with file validation (MP3/WAV/M4A, max 50MB), progress tracking, and integration with backend actor to store uploaded audio files.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeUploadDia: Dialog component for configuring and uploading songs to YouTube with title, description, and privacy settings; currently shows UI flow with placeholder implementation noting OAuth2 requirements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Custom hook providing audio playback controls (play/pause, seek, volume) with state management for current time, duration, loading status, and event handling for HTML5 Audio element.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerationStatus.t: Hook that simulates multi-stage song generation progress (analyzing, composing, synthesizing, mixing, mastering) and calls backend to complete lyrics request with a dummy audio file upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validation using @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessingStatus.t: Hook that orchestrates multi-stage audio processing workflow with progress tracking, creates dummy audio data, and calls backend actor to save the generated cover with voice sample and song references.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user library, covers, lyrics requests, and voice personas, with automatic refetching and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: Custom React hook for browser-based voice recording using MediaRecorder API, with real-time audio level monitoring and duration tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (using OKLCH), animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an AI voice cover app with architectural notes, known issues (songs not saving to library), and a list of implemented features.
